participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, he enjoys sharing experiences with his son and has a deep appreciation for storytelling.
participant_1.background: i am a stay at home dad. i've a son who is in junior high school. i spent a decade working in the human services field. horror movies are my favorites.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and caring, she has a passion for nurturing talent and values time spent outdoors with her daughter.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. i enjoy going to the park. i'm now looking for a new job.
